decks.notes: This deck aims to quickly ramp up mana and cheat in powerful creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Griselbrand using cards like Show and Tell and Sneak Attack. By putting big threats into play early, the deck puts pressure on the opponent and can win the game in just a few turns. The deck also includes ways to protect its combo pieces with cards like Force of Will and Flusterstorm. The key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with big creatures before they have a chance to respond.

The main concept of the deck is to use a combination of spells and creatures to quickly mill through your library and win the game with Thassa's Oracle or Fell the Profane. Cards like Lotus Petal, Simian Spirit Guide, and Dark Ritual allow for fast mana ramping, while Boggart Trawler and Undercity Informer help with the mill strategy. Pact of Negation provides protection for key combo pieces, and Cabal Therapy can disrupt opponent's plans. Overall, the deck focuses on assembling the combo pieces quickly and efficiently to secure a win.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize Mystic Forge and other key artifacts like Basalt Monolith and Karn, the Great Creator to create a powerful combo that allows for fast mana acceleration and card advantage. By utilizing cards like Voltaic Key and Pithing Needle, the deck is able to control the board and manipulate artifacts to its advantage. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with a powerful engine that generates threats and card advantage.

The main concept of this deck is to use the synergy between Painter's Servant and Grindstone to mill the opponent's library. By naming a color with Painter's Servant, all cards milled with Grindstone will be of that color, leading to a win condition of emptying the opponent's library. The deck also includes various control elements such as Pyroblast and Red Elemental Blast, as well as mana acceleration and tutors to help assemble the combo quickly. The overall strategy revolves around setting up the combo and protecting it until victory is achieved.

The main concept of this deck is to combo off with Mystic Forge and manipulate artifacts to generate infinite mana using cards like Basalt Monolith and Grim Monolith. This allows for powerful plays using Karn, the Great Creator to shut down opponent's strategies or to search for key artifacts. The deck also includes cards like Urza's Saga and Urza's Workshop to support the artifact theme and generate additional mana. Ultimately, the goal is to establish a dominant board presence and overwhelm the opponent with powerful artifact synergies and combos.

The main concept of the deck is to quickly assemble and cast Doomsday, a powerful combo spell that allows the player to rearrange the top 5 cards of their library to set up a winning combination. The deck includes various ways to find and protect Doomsday, such as Brainstorm, Ponder, and Force of Will, as well as cards like Lotus Petal and Dark Ritual to generate mana quickly. Once Doomsday has been cast, the player can use cards like Thassa's Oracle to win the game by drawing their entire deck and ensuring victory.
